sentences.sentence: On the inner shelf, the main geomorphic types have mamelon and pit-and-pots.
sentences.translation: 在内部架子上，主要的地貌类型有小圆丘和坑坑洼洼。

sentences.sentence: Thus, influences of vegetation on soil erosion and geomorphic evolution can be positive or negative.
sentences.translation: 因此，植被对土壤侵蚀和地貌演变，既有正的作用，也有负的作用。

sentences.sentence: How to dynamically display the development is one of the difficulties of the geomorphic model study.
sentences.translation: 如何动态表现这种演变，一直是地貌模型研究的难点之一。
